per_frame_1=basstime = basstime + bass*0.03;
per_frame_2=basstime2 = basstime + bass*0.03;
per_frame_3=q1 = basstime2;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=//start in most active range
per_frame_6=basstime = if(below(basstime,1000),1000,basstime);
per_frame_7=//basstime = if(above(basstime,495),450,basstime);
per_frame_8=basstime = basstime + bass_att*0.03;
per_frame_9=vol = pow(bass+mid+treb,2);
per_frame_10=basssum = vol;
per_frame_11=stickybit = time%2;
per_frame_12=//avg vol
per_frame_13=//buffer 1
per_frame_14=volAvg = volAvg + vol*equal(stickybit,1);
per_frame_15=//number of samples 1 or framerate
per_frame_16=sample1 = sample1 + equal(stickybit,1);
per_frame_17=//buffer 2
per_frame_18=volAvg2 = volAvg2 + vol*equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_19=//number of samples 2
per_frame_20=sample2 = sample2 + equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_21=//transision
per_frame_22=edge = bnot(equal(bit2,stickybit));
per_frame_23=volAvg = volAvg - volAvg*edge*stickybit;
per_frame_24=volAvg2 = volAvg2 - volAvg2*edge*equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_25=sample1 = sample1  - sample1*edge*stickybit;
per_frame_26=sample2 = sample2  - sample2*edge*equal(stickybit,0);
per_frame_27=//test vol against avg buffer lvl
per_frame_28=diff = if(equal(stickybit,1), (basssum/(volAvg2/sample2)) , 0);
per_frame_29=diff = if(equal(stickybit,0), (basssum/(volAvg/sample1)), diff);
per_frame_30=q3 = diff;
per_frame_31=bit2 = time%2;
per_frame_32=difftime = difftime + diff*0.03;
per_frame_33=q2 = difftime;
per_frame_34=//fix a strange error
per_frame_35=difftime = if(above(difftime,2000),0, difftime);
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=q10= cos(q1*0.0000004);
per_frame_39=q11 = sin(q1*0.000004);
per_frame_40=q13 = 1;
per_frame_41=
per_frame_42=//rot = 0.02;
per_pixel_1=zoom = 1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{  
warp_3=`    float2x2 rot = { q10 - pow((rad-0.5),rad*10)*0.02 , q11 + pow((rad-0.5),rad*10)*0.02,
warp_4=`                -q11  +pow((rad-0.5),rad*10)*0.02 , q10 + pow((rad-0.5),rad*10)*0.02};
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // sample previous frame
warp_7=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, mul((uv-0.5),rot)*0.99 + 0.5 ).xyz;
warp_8=`    
warp_9=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_10=`    ret -= 0.002; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_11=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`    float small_rad =0.01;
comp_5=`    float3 color = GetBlur1(uv);
comp_6=`       float2x2 rot = { q10 + small_rad + color.x, q11,
comp_7=`                -q11  + color.y, q10};
comp_8=`    rot*=q13;
comp_9=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*float2(-1,1) + 0.5;
comp_10=`    ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.98 + 0.5).xyz, 
comp_11=`                tex2D(sampler_main, (uv_echo-0.5)*0.98 + 0.5).xyz, 
comp_12=`                0 
comp_13=`              ) 
comp_14=` + GetBlur1(uv)*0.2 + GetBlur1(uv)*0.2
comp_15=` + GetBlur1(uv)*0.4 + GetBlur1(uv)*0.4;
comp_16=`    //ret = ret*0.9; //gamma
comp_17=`// ret = mul(ret.xy,rot).xyx;    
comp_18=`    
comp_19=`    ret =  ret*(1 - ret)*ret*3; //brighten
comp_20=`  ret *= 2;
comp_21=`}
